distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for mutt fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-1328: Fixed an invalid memory access when reading untrusted uuencoded
  data. This could result in including private memory in replies (bsc#1198518).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Buffer Overflow in uudecoder in Mutt affecting all versions starting from 0.94.13 before 2.2.3 allows read past end of input line
notes.title: Vulnerability description
